message: Don't have any personal experience with this guy, but I asked him some questions and he seems to be very promising http://www.quora.com/Dana-H-Shultz
Can anyone recommend a startup lawyer in the Bay Area?

I've had a very good experience with the folks at Dorsey (http://www.dorsey.com/), and they also sponsor StartupDigest email newsletter, with the following sentence: "Dorsey & Whitney Need legal advice for your startup? Get in touch with Matt Bartus, the best startup lawyer in the Valley." I have personally not used Matt, but other memebers of the firm, at two companies and been happy, overall.
